title: Styles (Collection)
summary: Seven different watch faces in one for Android Wear Watch Face
description: Styles is a collection of watch faces, that allow you to express yourself depending on your mood.I have tried to mix up the collection so you have a wide variety of different styles to choose from.Some have limited settings with them.★ Chalkboard - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.★ Pirate Map - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.★ Broken Face - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.★ Graffiti - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.★ Military Style - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.★ Antique - 12/24 hour time on ambient mode only.★ 24 Hour - 12/24 hour time on ambient mode onlyYou can swap and choose whatever suits your mood.No further purchases required, there will be no hidden in app purchases either.Pay once, get everything.If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.Configuration options.★ 12/24 hour★ Text Colors★ Watch FacesTo install please refer to the Wear Support Page.https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devicesIf you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
descriptionHTML:
Styles is a collection of watch faces, that allow you to express yourself depending on your mood.
I have tried to mix up the collection so you have a wide variety of different styles to choose from.
Some have limited settings with them.

★ Chalkboard - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.
★ Pirate Map - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.
★ Broken Face - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.
★ Graffiti - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.
★ Military Style - editable text color and 12/24 hour time.
★ Antique - 12/24 hour time on ambient mode only.
★ 24 Hour - 12/24 hour time on ambient mode only

You can swap and choose whatever suits your mood.
No further purchases required, there will be no hidden in app purchases either.
Pay once, get everything.

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.

Configuration options.
★ 12/24 hour
★ Text Colors
★ Watch Faces

To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.
https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435

Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devices

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
comments: Decent Some nice ideas but needs updates to fill potential. The round white faces look nasty on a square watch and need altering to fill the screen. Would also be nice to have the option to choose between analogue and digital display like you did with the GBTQ face.
recentChanges: Version 4 - Cleaned up the config screen and removed unnecessary code.
